file.title: DOM Review
file.bullet: What is the DOM?
Document Object Model
What is it use to do?
It allows us to interact with the webpage.
What is the top level node of the DOM?
The document.
What are some ways we can get elements from the document?
We can get them by using the id, the class, or the tag name.
What method gets elements by their Id?
document.getElementById()
What method gets elements by their class?
document.getElementsByClassName
What does document.getElementsByClassName return?
It returns an HTML element collection (NodeList) of elements.
What method gets elements by their HTML tag?
document.getElementsByTagName()
What is the innerHTML?
Everything that appears between the two element tags.
What is the difference between the innerHTML and the innerText?
The property innerText behaves in a similar manner, but it ignores any HTML tags.
How can we tell if an element has a given attribute?
Use the hasAttribute() method.
What are the "data-*" attributes used to do?
They store meta data related to the element, usually related back to the database.
How do we set the background color for an element?
We use it's "style['background-color']" notation, because of the hyphen.
